about_the_game:
A demonic anomaly has been detected in an important research facility. DATA agents... deploy!

In 1969, mankind established its first link to the Aethernet. Humanity soon entered a golden age of technological wonder and prosperity.
But, kept secret from the eyes of the public, a second discovery was made shortly after... demons weren't just the subject of myths and religion.
To combat them, the Demonic Anomalies Termination Agency was born. An FBI offshoot where agents are partnered with daemons through a pact, their mission: send the demons back where they belong.

GAMEPLAY

In this fixed camera action game you and your squad will have to explore a top secret facility. Balance the powers of both magic and lead to defeat the demons who are rampaging throughout it!
Battles take place in real-time, requiring you to dodge enemy attacks and find the perfect time to retaliate against them. As you shoot enemies you'll gain mana which you can use to cast spells to gain an advantage. On the verge of death will you choose to use what little mana you have to heal yourself, or will you try to blast away one of your foes so the battle becomes easier? Make strategic use of your resources and complete your mission!

A RACE AGAINST THE CLOCK

As you explore the facility you'll be able to find information, and maybe even spells, to help you with your mission. However, you'll be faced with a constant timer that ticks down even when in battles. Failing to get to the bottom of things before time runs out won't spell the end for you, but...

BONUS CHALLENGES

In addition to the main mission there are over 15 bonus challenges that can be tackled! Defeat the enemies, protect the target, and more as you aim for the best score possible! Can you get a gold rank in all of them?

THE CAST





stopshrinkingmycolumn

SILVIA

An experienced agent, she has been working at DATA for a decade. Felt like nobody ever had her back until she got assigned to Alfonso's squad, thus adopted a bit of a rebellious attitude. Competent at her job, she enjoys being sent on assignments despite her snarky remarks.

RANRU

Silvia's daemon, bound by pact. Quite reliable, has learned to adapt to Silvia's attitude and does his best to cheer her up.
While she might not show it, Silvia is glad to have been partnered with him. Their mutual trust has resulted in Ranru evolving and being able to cast a variety of magicks.

ALFONSO

The leader of the squad, his expertise has gained him notoriety within DATA veterans. After a mission gone wrong and a falling off with his previous team, he was reassigned to direct a smaller, fast-response squad, which he's now fond of.

LEA

The latest addition to the squad, recruited due to her excellent track record as a police officer. Has great social skills and is used to dealing with civilians, but is still trying to fit in in DATA. Greatly respects Alfonso and Silvia.




FEATURES:

  • Supports both modern camera relative controls and classic tank controls, as well as full input rebinding
  • Three different routes and multiple endings
  • Boss encounters
  • Hidden spells and other optional oddities
  • A fantastic soundtrack with an unlockable music player to listen to it anytime
  • Auto-saving. No typewriters or phones here!
  • Inspired by retro titles from the 90's like Parasite Eve 2 and Dino Crisis
  • And more...

content_descriptors.notes: Contains guns, stylized blood, and dead people.

name: Aether Singularity
short_description: Take on the role of a special agent and fight against digital demons from the Aethernet with your Daemon partner. Something's gone wrong in a prominent research facility, and you and your squad have been deployed to uncover the source of the demonic threat that's been unleashed. Destroy all demons!
